lyrics:
When I'm with you
I hear a song
That makes me laugh
And smile
And sing to you

When I'm with you
I feel so free
I feel that love
Is going
To take control
Of me

When I'm with you

It's so real
What I feel
When I'm with you

When I'm with you
I wonder why
People just stop
And stare
And smile at us

When I'm with you
The sun shines our way
Maybe our love
Reflects its rays of light
On everyone in the world

When I'm with you

It's so real
What I feel
Its ok
Everyday

Honey it's so nice
So right
When I'm with you

Nobody but you
Honey I love you

Yeah
